title: [Large-Scale] Mental Health Counseling Competency Enhancement Program for Labor and Social Security Lawyers

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational understanding of labor laws and social security systems
context.additional_context: Discussion-based training program in smartphone-limited tech environments, with formative assessments to progressively enhance counseling competencies

learning_goals: They can explain three core competencies related to occupational mental health counseling in labor and social security fields: application of relevant laws, case analysis, and support for employee reinstatement.
They can improve counseling strategies by 80% or more, incorporating peer feedback from actual case-based discussions.
They can achieve a 20% or higher improvement in average scores across seven items in pre-post formative assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
